articles.author: Lauren Mascarenhas and Kristen Holmes, CNN
articles.title: First shipments of Pfizer vaccine to be delivered December 15 - CNN
articles.description: The first shipments of Pfizer's coronavirus vaccine will be delivered on December 15, according to an Operation Warp Speed document obtained by CNN on Tuesday.

articles.author: Parija Kavilanz, CNN Business
articles.title: Sephora is opening up mini shops inside Kohl's stores - CNN
articles.description: Sephora is set to open mini shops inside Kohl's stores, with the first 200 locations debuting in fall of 2021. It's part of an effort to reach more customers outside the mall.

articles.title: Nikola shares see another ugly sell-off in volatile trading as insider lockup period expires - CNBC
articles.description: Shares of Nikola dropped 14.9% in heavy trading Tuesday after an insider lockup period expired on up to 166 million shares of the electric truck start-up.
